hero.headline: Fuel your world of
hero.subheadline: Do you have a head full of stories, doodles, poems, or big ideas? At Young Minds @ Edura, your imagination has no limits!
hero.description: It’s a sparkle zone made just for kids who love to write, draw, explore, and create — and a wonderland of ideas for parents to celebrate every milestone.

whyJoin.title: Why Join Young Minds @ Edura?
whyJoin.description1: Because every child deserves to be celebrated. We understand how much parents value appreciation and recognition for their children’s creativity — especially those between 5-12 years.
whyJoin.description2: Schools often miss opportunities to nurture imagination, so we created a platform where kids can:

features.title: Think Beyond
features.desc: Learn to think, imagine, and express — beyond the classroom.

features.title: Celebrate Originality
features.desc: Be rewarded and celebrated for originality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To spark a love for reading, writing, and creating in every child — helping them imagine, explore, and grow. At the same time, we give parents the joy of seeing their child’s work celebrated, shared, and proudly showcased in print or online.

bubbles.title: Choose Your Adventure
bubbles.subtitle: Select a bubble to start exploring!

items.title: Express Yourself
items.description: Upload writing works like stories, poems, and more.

items.title: Challenge Yourself
items.description: Participate in monthly writing, science, and art competitions.

items.title: Brainy Bites
items.description: Join workshops for creative writing, math, science, and more.
